name: totals.Rk
explanation: the ranking of the player in this team

name: totals.Player
explanation: the name of the player in this team

name: totals.Age
explanation: the age of the player in this team

name: totals.G
explanation: total number of games played by this player

name: totals.GS
explanation: total number of games started of this player

name: totals.MP
explanation: the total minutes played by this player

name: totals.FG
explanation: total number of field goals of this player

name: totals.FGA
explanation: total number of field goals attempted of this player

name: totals.3P
explanation: total number of three-point field goal of this player

name: totals.3PA
explanation:
total number of three-point field goal attempt of
                  this player

name: totals.3P.
explanation:
three-point field goals percentage of this player,
                  calculated from dividing three-point field goals by 
                  three-point field goals attempted

name: totals.2P
explanation: total number of two-point field goal of this player

name: totals.2PA
explanation:
total number of two-point field goal attempted
                  of this player

name: totals.2P.
explanation:
two-point field goal percentage,
                  calculated from dividing two-point field goals by
                  two-point field goals attempted

name: totals.eFG.
explanation:
effective field goals percentage of this player,
                  formula is (FG + 0.5 * 3P) / FGA

name: totals.FT
explanation: total number of free throws by this player

name: totals.FTA
explanation: total number of free throw attempted by this player

name: totals.FT.
explanation:
free throw percentage of this player, calculated from 
                  dividing number of free throws by number of free throws
                  attempted

name: totals.ORB
explanation: total number of offensive rebound of this player

name: totals.DRB
explanation: totalnumber of defensive rebound of this player

name: totals.TRB
explanation: total number of total rebound of this player

name: totals.AST
explanation: total number of assists to turnover of this player

name: totals.STL
explanation: total number of steals made by this player

name: totals.BLK
explanation: total number of blocks made by this player

name: totals.TOV
explanation: total number of turnovers made by this player

name: totals.PF
explanation: total number of personal fouls of this player

name: totals.PTS
explanation: total number of points that this player got
